page.title: 08WADDINGTON WIVES GROUP
page.content: The Waddington and Brant Road Wives Group has been running 17 years. It has 60 members and meets in the church once a month, on every third Tuesday. People go to meet other mums and talk about their problems. Women can join when they are married. They go on visits to places of interest like the zoo and air shows. They sometimes take the children to the theatre. This year they are going on a boat trip. People come and entertain them and teach them things that help them in the home. They raise money by having jumble sales. It is the only club in Waddington that takes the people from upper and lower Waddington.
